snippet: Plaintiffs charge that the May 2 fight between Manny Pacquiao and Floyd Mayweather Jr. was a fraud and are seeking the return of their pay-per-view money.
abstract: Federal judge in Los Angeles will begin hearing arguments from plaintiffs who say Las Vegas boxing match between Manny Pacquiao and Floyd Mayweather Jr was fraud and want their pay-per-view charges refunded; most of suits name both boxers, their promoters, HBO and Showtime as defendants.
lead_paragraph: Plaintiffs charge that the May 2 fight between Manny Pacquiao and Floyd Mayweather Jr. was a fraud and are seeking the return of their pay-per-view money.

headline.main: Mayweather-Pacquiao Lawsuits to Be Argued in Los Angeles
